data.title: Jerian Grant Sees Potential for Expanded Role With Magic
data.meta_description: LAS VEGAS â€“ On his first day in Orlando after he was acquired in a trade by the Magic, Jerian Grant fittingly got advice and spent time at the house of a close friend who basically lived with him a decade ago. And, probably, in a couple of days or so when the news finally gets around to his technologically challenged uncle, Grant will have another tremendous source of information about playing NBA basketball in Orlando.
